name: Easy Frozen Strawberry Pie
author: Stella Reinagel
instructions: Mix all ingredients. Cook strawberries, sugar, cornstarch and Jell-O to boil. To seal the crust, mix 4 tablespoons of the mixture with 2 tablespoons of butter and pour over crust. Let cool. Pour remaining mixture into crusts. Refrigerate 1 to 2 hours. Garnish with whipped topping.
